short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple pop out Contest reminder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never ever forget any coding contest
Specific features
-  Visit a Coding Contest in one click. 
-  Delete a contest in the list.
-  Add your own contest and store it in the list
-  Refresh button that keeps you update with latest contest in coming 24 hours

Sites we support?
-  Codechef
-  Codeforces
-  Hacker Earth
-  Leetcode
and many more...

Contest in 24 doesnâ€™t take any personal information from the user. It fetches data from API's one an hour and stores it in chrome database.

Shout out to kontests.net for providing with awesome api's.

We are planning to make our own API's hope then we can perform better.
